A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A horrible film with no direction and lazy writing. I was expecting Rey to be awesome and go through this journey to figure out how she fits in the Jedi universe\, but her role faded away. The story mainly focused on Poe (who is a very childish\, annoying character) and Finn. Kyle Ren is also a terrible (and childish/annoying) villain. Not looking forward to the next film. I left the theater very disappointed.
